snippet.title: Brave Eduardo Tokyo Game Show 2022 Announcement Trailer and Developer Talk
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1962850/Brave_Eduardo/

Play as a teddy bear trying to find his place in a vast 2D Open World set in the Victorian era. Explore bustling towns and magical biomes while befriending a diverse cast of bears on your journey. Just BEAR in mind: everyone isn't as they seem.

Steam version available on Q2 2023, other platforms TBD.
